abstract: JPMorgan Chase stands to gain $29 billion windfall as a result of an accounting rule that allows it to transform the bad loans that it purchased from Washington Mutual into income, Bloomberg News reports.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase stands to gain $29 billion windfall as a result of an accounting rule that allows it to transform the bad loans that it purchased from Washington Mutual into income, Bloomberg News reports.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase stands to gain $29 billion as a result of an accounting rule that allows it to transform the bad loans that it purchased from Washington Mutual into income, Bloomberg News reports.

headline.main: WaMu Windfall Seen for JPMorgan Chase
